Others: Finidi George, the head coach of the senior national team of Nigeria, has made changes to the team's lineup for the game against Benin Republic.
Kelechi Iheanacho has been dropped from the starting lineup, with Samuel Chukwueze expected to start in his place.
Raphael Onyedika, who impressed as a substitute in the previous game, has been included in the starting lineup.
Benjamin Tanimu retains his spot in the starting lineup for the game against Benin Republic.
